caption.p: Subcellular localization of S. glabra sesquiterpene synthases. Confocal laser scanning microscopy of SgSTPS1 and SgSTPS2 using GFP-fusion proteins in Nicotiana benthamiana. GFP, GFP fluorescene; Auto, chlorophyll autofluorescene; Merged, combined GFP and chlorophyll autofluorescene. Scale bars = 20 Î¼m.
